title: NBA Finals Game 3 Reaction
description:
Zach Lowe and Brian Windhorst are joined by Kings’ guard Tyrese Haliburton to talk Giannis’ dominant Game 3, Ayton getting in foul trouble, how Game 4 will set the tone for the series and Chris Paul’s leadership.

itunes:subtitle: Lowe Post: Giannis Dominates Game 3, How Game 4 Will Set The Tone For The Series
